Core¶

class anyactions.core.hub.ActionHub(env={}, model_provider='openai', api_dir_path='.actions/', config_path='.actions/.config', observer=True)¶

This is the main class for managing tools and API calls.

act(response_object)¶

Execute the action based on response object and return the raw response

call(action_name, input_params)¶

call tool functions directly without model

set_key(action_name, api_key)¶

Set up authentication (API key) for a tool by adding an API key to the local environment

tools(tool_list)¶

Initialize a set of tool definitions available to LLM It loads existing local tools and use retriever to set up new tools If the entry in tool_list is a dictionary, it is treated as the tool definition directly

Parameters:

tool_list (List[str | dict]) – List of tool names or tool definitions

Raises:

  • Exception – tool definition parsing failed

  • ValueError – tool definition is not in the correct format

Returns:

tool definition list

Return type:

List[dict]

exception anyactions.core.retriever.AWSGatewayException(message, cause=None)¶
exception anyactions.core.retriever.AWSInternalException(message, cause=None)¶
exception anyactions.core.retriever.AnyActionsException(message, cause=None)¶
class anyactions.core.retriever.Client(base_url='', api_key=None, observer=False)¶

Client to interact with the AnyActions API, deployed on AWS API Gateway.

get(path, query=None)¶

Send a GET request to the API.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – The path of the API endpoint.

  • query (dict) – The query to send with the request.

Return type:

tuple[RequestStatus, dict | None]

Returns:

The response from the API, or None if the request failed.

post(path, data)¶

Send a POST request to the API.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – The path of the API endpoint.

  • data (dict) – The data to send with the request.

Return type:

RequestStatus

Returns:

The status of the request.

Builder for GetApiByProviderActionRequest

exception anyactions.core.retriever.LocalToolException(message, cause=None)¶
class anyactions.core.retriever.RequestStatus(value, names=None, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)¶
class anyactions.core.retriever.ToolDefinition(**data)¶
model_computed_fields: ClassVar[Dict[str, ComputedFieldInfo]] = {}¶

A dictionary of computed field names and their corresponding ComputedFieldInfo objects.

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[Dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'function': FieldInfo(annotation=Function, required=True), 'type': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='function')}¶

Metadata about the fields defined on the model, mapping of field names to [FieldInfo][pydantic.fields.FieldInfo] objects.

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.
